title: Travel Health Appointments | VMFH
cleaned_text: Travel to low-risk countries such as Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, or to Western Europe usually do not require a visit. It is suggested that the appointment be made four to six weeks prior to travel, in order to complete all necessary immunizations. However, it is still worthwhile and recommended to visit the Travel Health Clinic, even if you are traveling on short notice. Schedule an appointment by calling [206-583-6585](tel:2065836585). Travelers should come with their country by country itinerary and immunization history. Your physician consultation will include: Appointments are available with our infectious disease and tropical medical specialists. Call [206-341-0846](tel:206-341-0846) for more information or to make an appointment.
